rules_text:
Token or fortified lands you control are 1/1 creatures in addition to their other types.
Fortified land has “When this creature attacks, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn. Sacrifice this creature at the end of combat.”
Fortify–{G}, Sacrifice a creature. [i]({G}, Sacrifice a creature: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery.)[/i]
